GSD.product_version: versions from v5.4 to before v5.12.2
GSD.description:
perf/core: Fix unconditional security_locked_down() call

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.12.2 by commit c7b0208ee370b89d20486fae71cd9abb759819c1, it was introduced in version v5.4 by commit b0c8fdc7fdb77586c3d1937050925b960743306e. For more details please see the references link.
